So sit there, pretending you're a trendmaker or on the cusp of something new or groundbreaking. You're not. You're at a fashion car show.
It's not the dept. stores' own collections? You're just seeing very select outifts in the flesh, a year after the world saw them online
The placebo of attending Brown Thomas or Arnotts fashion shows when the same outfits were on runways in London, Paris and Milan a YEAR ago
